price: Na buri bantu bafite icyerekezo berekeramo (basali), ngaho nimurushanwe mu gukora ibyiza, kandi aho muzaba muri hose Allah azabahuriza hamwe mwese (ku munsi w’imperuka). Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ushobora byose.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ وِجۡهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَاۖ فَٱسۡتَبِقُواْ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُواْ يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walikullin wij'hatun huwa muwallīhā fa-is'tabiqū al-khayrāti ayna mā takūnū yati bikumu al-lahu jamīʿan inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
